entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 01:36 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.3°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.7°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
